parameter.name: flumeUser
parameter.label: User Name
parameter.description: The user name (email address) associated with your Flume account

parameter.name: flumePass
parameter.label: Password
parameter.description: The password associated with your Flume account

parameter.name: clientId
parameter.label: Client ID
parameter.description: The client ID for Flume API access. This can be aquired by logging in to your Flume account on a computer (https://portal.flumetech.com/), navigating to the account settings, and scrolling to the very bottom in the section "API Access."

parameter.name: clientSecret
parameter.label: Client Secret
parameter.description: The client secret for Flume API access; found with the client ID."

parameter.name: deviceId
parameter.label: Device ID
parameter.description: The alphanumeric device ID associated with the Flume Device. Only obtainable via the Flume API.

parameter.name: waterUseInterval
parameter.label: Water Use Interval
parameter.description: Update time interval in minutes to request water usage updates.

parameter.name: deviceStatusInterval
parameter.label: Device Status Interval
parameter.description: Update time interval in minutes to request device updates.
